item.title: I Was Trash
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
He was looked down on, forced to break off his engagement, he was murdered, maybe this is the life that trash should have… But he was taken over by me, the strongest cultivator, Cang Kun Zi, as I reborned. Now that I’m here, I’ll make the best of it! Watch as I use this trash...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: He was looked down on, forced to break off his engagement, he was murdered, maybe this is the life that trash should have… But he was taken over by me, the strongest cultivator, Cang Kun Zi, as I reborned. Now that I’m here, I’ll make the best of it! Watch as I use this trash body of mine to trample upon you mere ants!

item.title: Panfia
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description: Its been 15 years after the last Great War. While the scars of wars appear to have vanished on the outside.In truth, the world has become a much harsher place.Follow the journey of Felix and Bay on their quest to find someone from their past.
item.content:encoded: Its been 15 years after the last Great War. While the scars of wars appear to have vanished on the outside.In truth, the world has become a much harsher place.Follow the journey of Felix and Bay on their quest to find someone from their past.
